## TsConfigJson.CompilerOptions.noUncheckedIndexedAccess property

Add `undefined` to a type when accessed using an index.

Requires TypeScript version 4.1 or later.

 false

**Signature:**

```typescript
noUncheckedIndexedAccess?: boolean;
```
